artist: Pierre Bonnard; Author: Paul Verlaine; Woodcutter: Woodcuts by Tony Beltrand; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard; Printer: Imprimerie Nationale, Paris; Printer: Lithography by Auguste Clot; Book binder: Georges Cretté
life_date: Pierre Bonnard, French, 1867–1947; Paul Verlaine, Author, French, 1844–1896; Woodcuts by Tony Beltrand, Woodcutter, French, 1847–1904; Ambroise Vollard, Publisher, French, 1867–1939; Imprimerie Nationale, Paris, Printer; Lithography by Auguste Clot, Printer, French (1858–1936); Georges Cretté, Book binder, French, 1893–1969
medium: Lithographs in rose ink, wood engravings, and letterpress, bound volume

title: Parallèlement
